name: Hold the king
description:
Hold The King

Made in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1  -  Theme: Stronger Together 

Hold the king while he eats his dinner.  Collect threads and twist ropes together to make stronger ones. Be quick, because the king keeps getting heavier! 

This was the first Game Jam I participated in, it was very stressfull, but also alot of fun. I hope you enjoy my result!
